author: itv.com
title: Confirmed: Foo Fighters will headline Glastonbury
text:
It's been confirmed that international rock band the Foo Fighters will be one of the headliners at this year's Glastonbury Festival.
Glastonbury Festival @GlastoFest Follow We still can't believe @ foofighters came to Somerset to announce they're headlining Saturday night this year. Justâ€¦ https://t.co/fkxQePs2yx
20:53 - 24 Feb 2017 Retweet Reply Favourite The announcement was made during a secret gig at an arts centre in Somerset.
They performed at the Cheese and Grain in Frome, which has a capacity of just 500.
It was an invite-only gig for members of the Foo Fighters fan club.
Foo Fighters @foofighters Follow Foo Fighters Live from Frome, UK https://t.co/jCaZTtsEo1
19:53 - 24 Feb 2017 Retweet Reply Favourite Entertainment Glastonbury Festival Foo Fighters
